title: Teacher Capacity-Building Program for Technology Adoption and Training Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers focusing on designing training programs and technology adoption strategies in ICT-based educational environments. Provides flexible learning environments using learners' personal devices

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze technology acceptance factors based on the UTAUT model and apply them to training program design
Learners will demonstrate the correlation between training participation responses (training reactions) and behavioral intentions through project-based tasks
Learners will produce project deliverables capable of evaluating the mediating effects of facilitating conditions (technical infrastructure/support systems) on behavioral intentions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
